誫誫誫

誫字的基本解释

誫
zhèn
古同“震”：“罪乎不誫不止。”

誫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèn］
［《廣韻》章刃切，去震，章。］
亦作“誫1”。“甄2”的被通假字。
(1)雷，响雷。
(2)雷殛，雷击。
(3)震动。
(4)有时特指地震。
(5)情绪激动；心动。
(6)振奋，振兴。
(7)威势；威严。
(8)惊惧或使惊惧。
(9)指东方。
(10)八卦之一。象征雷震。又为六十四卦之一，震下震上。
(11)通“祗”。恭敬。
[②]［shēn］
［《集韻》升人切，平真，書。］
通“娠1”。
怀孕。

誫字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誫； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1165第04
【字彙補】支信切，音震。【列子·黃帝篇】罪乎不誫不止。【音義】罪當作萌，誫音正。據此，則當作之盛切。

誫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
誫字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Truncate
zhèn
Gu Tong "shocked": "The crime will never stop."
Truncate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhèn］
["Guangyun" chapter blade cut, go to shake, chapter. ]
Also known as "誫1". The false word for "Zhen 2" is passed.
(1) Thunder, thunder.
(2) Thunder, lightning strike.
(3) Vibration.
(4) Sometimes it refers specifically to earthquakes.
(5) Excited; heartbeat.
(6) Invigorate and revitalize.
(7) Power; majesty.
(8) Frightened or frightened.
(9) Refers to the East.
(10) One of the gossip. Symbol of thunder shock. It is also one of the sixty-four hexagrams, shaking down and shaking up.
(11) "Only". Respectfully.
[②] [shēn]
["Ji Yun" ascend to cut, plain, book. ]
Pass "pregnancy 1".
pregnancy.
Truncate
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　誫; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1165 04
【Word Supplement】The support letter is cut, and the sound is vibrating. 【Liezi·Huangdi Chapter】The crime is hard to stop. [Sound and meaning] Sin is regarded as cute, and the sound is correct. According to this, it is regarded as prosperous.
